content.rendered: “Now take a moment out of your day to be still and present. Take your time, and fully appreciate the delightful aroma and flavour of this calming Bodhi tea. Feel your heart beat and breath slow down, as you relax your body and calm your mind.”

excerpt.rendered: “Now take a moment out of your day to be still and present. Take your time, and fully appreciate the delightful aroma and flavour of this calming Bodhi tea. Feel your heart beat and breath slow down, as you relax your body and calm your mind.”
